concept.title: 218.202 Defense or recovery from certain events.

conbody.p: For acquisitions that, as determined by the head of the contracting activity, are to facilitate defense against or recovery from cyber, nuclear, biological, chemical, or radiological attack; to facilitate provision of international disaster assistance; or to support response to an emergency or major disaster, the following requirements do not apply:

(1) Policy for unique item identification at
216.601
(d)(i)(A)(1) and (2). See 216.601 (d)(3).
